data.message:
Let's get down to business
I don't got no time to play around, what is this?
Must be a circus in town, let's shut the shit down
On these clowns; can I get a witness? (Hell yeah!)

Nobody says it but still everybody knows the shit
Most hated on out of all those who say who get hated on in eighty songs and exaggerate it all so much they make it all up, there's no such thing, like a female with good looks, who cooks and cleans
It just means so much more to so much more people when youre rapping and you know what for, the show must go on so I'd like to welcome y'all to marshalls and Andres carnival
